trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANKJN304_02982_SEQ_00<tab>A happy ray is a productive ray, as Zukin well knows.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANKJN304_02982_TODO_01<tab>Feed the striped ray at krill swarms by using its Inhale ability.

TEXT_BANKJN304_02982_ZUKIN_000_000<tab>Fancy going for a little swim, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? If you have a moment to spare, Makura could use your help with the rays. They look after us, and so we must look after them.

TEXT_BANKJN304_02982_MAKURA_000_010<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I've been waiting for you. I need you to take one of our rays out for a good feed─a reward for all of its toils.
TEXT_BANKJN304_02982_MAKURA_000_011<tab>Now, the fellow loves few things more than krill, and you'll find swarms of them close by. Please have him feed till he's had his fill.
TEXT_BANKJN304_02982_MAKURA_000_012<tab>Should you become separated from the ray, worry not─he is trained to return here. Happy feeding, then, and let Zukin know when you're done!
TEXT_BANKJN304_02982_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>The ray sucks in a copious amount of seawater and krill.
TEXT_BANKJN304_02982_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>The ray sucks in a copious amount of seawater and krill.
TEXT_BANKJN304_02982_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>The ray sucks in a copious amount of seawater and krill.
TEXT_BANKJN304_02982_MAKURA_000_025<tab>There you are! The ray returned without you, and he's been champing at the bit to get back to his krill.
TEXT_BANKJN304_02982_SYSTEM_000_026<tab>There is a large swarm of krill. You make a mental note of the spot for feeding the ray.

TEXT_BANKJN304_02982_ZUKIN_000_030<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I understand you treated the ray to a veritable banquet. This will doubtless do wonders for its spirit.
TEXT_BANKJN304_02982_ZUKIN_000_031<tab>Makura tells me the creature is very fond of you, and who could blame it? When next it needs a good feed, I trust we can rely on you again.
TEXT_BANKJN304_02982_MAKURA_000_035<tab>Our little ray returned with a belly full of krill and a grin from gill to gill! Thank you so much, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
